title: The Great Gatsby
content: An amazing read! Could not put it down, finished this within two days. P.S. Daisy sucks!

title: Frankenstein
content: Mary Shelley has done it once again! I will be telling all of my friends to read this book. An exhilarating journey from beginning to end. Can't wait to see what Mary Shelley does next.

title: Brave New World
content: Not gonna lie, I wasn't sure about this book at first, but I'm so glad that I finished this book. Highly recommend. Also I wouldn't mind trying Soma lol.

title: Websters's New Illustrated Dictonary
content: A truly boring read. This book was much too wordy and had virtually no plot.
